The platform Canvas and the curriulum from Accelerate Ed has taken much longer than anticipated for teachers to get access and prepare for our students. Therefore, our online learners will not start until Tuesday Sept 8th. We want our face to face students and online students to be on the same pace and this will allow that to happen. These students will still start Tuesday Sept 1st (half day). Teachers will be teaching classrooms expectations, behavior expections, and new COVID protocols/procedures. Teachers and students will be getting to know each other while learning all of these expectations.

All learners will start using the Canvas platform on Tuesday Sept 8th!

We are excited to get another school year started!
